name: Blissey
flavorText:
Anyone who takes
even one bite of
BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly
caring and pleas­
ant to everyone.

previous.name: Miltank
previous.flavorText:
Its milk is packed
with nutrition,
making it the ultimate beverage
for the sick or
weary.

next.name: Raikou
next.flavorText:
The rain clouds it
carries let it
fire thunderbolts at will. They say
that it descended
with lightning.

pokemon.name: Happiny
pokemon.flavorText:
It loves round white things.
It carries an egg-shaped rock in
imitation of CHANSEY.

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.flavorText:
A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bring happiness to those
who manage to get
it.

ant to everyone.
